message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, as it's worth much more to you!  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 just isn't enough for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. That's a fair price for both of us.  Let's make this happen.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. That's the lowest I can go.

Bob, I appreciate you coming up to $10,250, but I'm still a little bit away from where I need to be. Let's meet in the middle. I'm offering you the product for $10,375. It's a great price for both of us, and I'm confident we can close this deal now.

I appreciate your persistence, but $10,375 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,250 was my last offer, but I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm starting to think about buying from John for $12,000
